doc:
Lisa Ortiz https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lisa_Ortiz 0 Lisa Ortiz is an American theatre and voice actress, as well as a voice director, best known for her roles in English anime adaptations, such as Lina Inverse in Slayers and Amy Rose in Sonic X. Lisa_Ortiz is an_American_theatre_and_voice_actress , as_well_as a_voice_director , best_known for her_roles in English_anime_adaptations , such_as Lina_Inverse in Slayers and Amy_Rose in Sonic_X.
